mowl.graph.walking_rdf_and_owl.triples module¶

class mowl.graph.walking_rdf_and_owl.triples.Triplet(entity_1, relation, entity_2, score=0.26961623969337023)¶

Bases: object

classmethod create_valid_triplet(string)¶
property entity_1¶
property entity_2¶
classmethod groupBy_entity_relation(triplets)¶

Given a list of triplets [(s_1,r_1,t_2),…,(s_n,r_n,t_n)], the function groups the triplets by checking equality on s_l and r_l. The result has the following form:

[[s_1,r_1,t_i],…,[s_1,r_k,t_i],…,[s_j,r_1,t_i],…,[s_j,r_k,t_i]]. j is the number of source nodes. k is the number of relations and i is a value from 1 to the number of target nodes.

classmethod groupBy_relation(triplets)¶
